attributes.title: Fran's Anthem Review - Ep. 210
attributes.description: Fran reviews Anthem, Andrea and Greg talkTetris 99, and Tim gives his preview of Yoshi's Crafted World.

attributes.title: Anthem Review Update - Ep. 211
attributes.description: Greg, Andrea, and Fran give their latest thoughts on Anthem.

attributes.title: Devil May Cry 5 Review - Ep. 212
attributes.description: Tim gives his Devil May Cry 5 review, Greg and Andrea give their Days Gone preview, and Barrett gives his impressions of Sekiro.

attributes.title: Predicting The Next Generation of Games w/ Jason Schreier - Ep. 214
attributes.description: Kotaku's Jason Schreier joins us to discuss all the GDC craziness, and what it means for the next generation of video games.

attributes.title: Iron Man VR Impressions - Ep. 216
attributes.description: Greg gives his impressions on all the latest PSVR games, Andrea talks PAX East, and more!

attributes.title: Casper's Devon Sawa Previews a New Game! - Ep. 217
attributes.description: Actor Devon Sawa joins us to talk Ancestors: The Humankind Odyssey, Katana Zero, and more!

attributes.title: Why Bloodborne Is So Special w/Anthony Rapp - Ep. 218
attributes.description: Star Trek Discovery's Anthony Rapp joins us to discuss Bloodborne, Smash Bros. Joker DLC, Destiny 2 and more.

attributes.title: Days Gone Review - Ep. 219
attributes.description: We review Days Gone and give our impressions on Mortal Kombat 11 and Fortnite Avengers content. Days Gone provided by PlayStation.

attributes.title: We Played Borderlands 3! - Ep. 220
attributes.description: Greg and Fran talk all about their experience playing Borderlands 3.

attributes.title: Games We Are Most Excited For This Year - Ep. 221
attributes.description: The crew go through all of their most anticipated 2019 titles.

attributes.title: Persona 5 Spoilercast - Special
attributes.description: Joey and Barrett FINALLY do a spoilercast for Persona 5 with special guests Lucy James and Jonathon Dornbush!

attributes.title: Rage 2 Impressions - Ep. 222
attributes.description: The crew go over their impressions on Rage 2, the Divison 2 raid, and Greg and Andrea five their first E3 Judges week game impressions.

attributes.title: Everybody's Golf VR is a Dating Sim? - Ep. 223
attributes.description: The crew talks about Andy's flirting experience in Everybody's Golf VR, their early impressions of Dauntless, and much more

attributes.title: Official E3 2019 Predictions and Bets - Ep. 224
attributes.description: Tim, Greg, Fran, and Andy give their offical bets and predictions on what will happen at E3 2019.

attributes.title: Xbox E3 2019 Review
attributes.description: All the biggest Xbox news of E3 2019! Cyberpunk 2077, Halo Infinite, Gears 5, and more!

attributes.title: Ubisoft E3 2019 Review
attributes.description: All the biggest Ubisoft news of E3 2019! Watch Dogs Legion, Gods and Monsters, Rainbow 6, and more!

attributes.title: Square Enix E3 2019 Review
attributes.description: All the biggest Square Enix news of E3 2019! Final Fantasy VII Remake, Avengers, Final Fantasy VIII Remastered, and more!

attributes.title: Nintendo E3 2019 Review
attributes.description: All the biggest Nintendo news of E3 2019! Banjo Kazooie in Smash, Zelda Breath of the Wild Sequel, and more!

attributes.title: We Love Bloodstained and Outer Wilds - Ep. 227
attributes.description: Andy, Fran, Andrea, and Greg jump into a bunch of games they've been playing and are in love with, two Switch titles you're sleeping on, and more!

attributes.title: What is the Game of the Year So Far? - Ep. 228
attributes.description: Tim, Andrea, and Greg talk about what they think game of the year might be and Tim gives his Crash Team Racing impressions.

attributes.title: Fire Emblem Three Houses Impressions - Ep. 229
attributes.description: Tim, Andrea, and Greg talk about The Dark Pictures Anthology, Call of Duty Modern Warfare, Sea of Solitude.

attributes.title: Why Dauntless Is Awesome - Ep. 231
attributes.description: Davis from The Warp Zone joins us to talk about Dauntless, Hunt Showdown, Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3, and more!

attributes.title: Wolfenstein Youngblood Impressions - Ep. 232
attributes.description: We give our thoughts on Wolfenstein Young Blood, Concrete Genie, Fire Emblem Three Houses, Division 2, and more!

attributes.title: 50 Fun Video Game Questions To Ask Your Friends - Ep. 233
attributes.description: Fran gives an update on Anthem, Andrea talks Wolfenstein, and we play a fun little game.

attributes.title: Astral Chain Impressions - Ep. 234
attributes.description: Tim gives his first impressions on Astral Chain, Fran talks about Rebel Galaxy Outlaw, and Andrea and Greg discuss the latest preview of Borderlands 3.

attributes.title: Control Review - Ep. 235
attributes.description: Greg reviews Control and Mobile Game of Bullshit returns.

attributes.title: Man of Medan Review, Predator PS4 Preview - Ep. 236
attributes.description: It's a bevy of video game reviews and impressions! The Dark Pictures: Man of Medan, Predator: Hunting Grounds, Creature in the Well, Telling Lies, and more!

attributes.title: Game Informer Reunion Show - Ep. 237
attributes.description: Javy Gwaltney and Suriel Vazquez join Imran Khan for a Gamescast about depression gaming, Catherine, Monster Hunter, and more.

attributes.title: Gears 5 Impressions - Ep. 238
attributes.description: Andrea Rene joins Tim, Greg, and Fran for the last time as they talk about Final Fantasy VII Remake, Avengers, Gears 5, Creature in the Well, and more!

attributes.title: Zelda Link's Awakening Impressions - Ep. 239
attributes.description: The boys talk about Zelda, Borderlands 3, Monster Hunter World Iceborne, and more.

attributes.title: Greg Miller Played The Last of Us 2! - Ep. 240
attributes.description: Blessing Jr. joins us to discuss Greg's time with The Last of Us 2, Sayonara Wild Hearts, the Nintendo Switch Lite, and more!

attributes.title: Destiny 2 Shadowkeep Impressions - Ep. 241
attributes.description: Fran and Andy give their impressions of the latest Destiny 2 expansion and Apex Legends Season 3, Imran tells us about Code Vein and Dragon Quest 11, and more!

attributes.title: Concrete Genie Review - Ep. 242
attributes.description: Greg gives his thoughts Concrete Genie, Fran talks Ghost Recon Breakpoint, and Imran totally sells Tim on Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair.

attributes.title: We Played Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and Luigi's Mansion 3! - Ep. 243
attributes.description: Greg and Tim got to go play Star Wars Jedi Fallen Order and a ton of Luigi's Mansion 3!

attributes.title: The Outer Worlds Review - Ep. 244
attributes.description: Kat Bailey joins us to talk Outer Worlds, Star Wars, FIFA, and more!

attributes.title: Death Stranding Review - Ep. 245
attributes.description: Greg Miller, Fran Mirabella III, Imran Khan, Tim Gettys, Kevin Coello, and Andy Cortez give their impressions and review of Death Stranding.

attributes.title: Top Most Iconic PlayStation Games - Ep. 246
attributes.description: The boys debate what the most iconic games of each PlayStation generation are.

attributes.title: Star Wars Jedi Fallen Order Review - Ep. 247
attributes.description: GameXplain's Ash Paulsen joins us for our Star Wars Jedi Fallen Order Review.

attributes.title: Google Stadia vs xCloud Hands-On Impressions - Ep. 248
attributes.description: The crew talk about Star Wars Jedi Fallen Order, Pokemon Sword and Shield, Google Stadia, xCloud, and more!

attributes.title: The Call-In Show - Ep. 249
attributes.description: Andy, Fran, and Imran check in on Pokémon Sword & Shield, Jedi: Fallen Order, Control, and more, and then wax nostalgic on the best games of the decade with calls from the audience.

attributes.title: Official Game Awards 2019 Predictions - Ep. 250
attributes.description: The boys go over their award and announcement predictions for The Game Awards 2019.

attributes.title: Life Is Strange 2 Spoilercast - Ep. 251
attributes.description: The devs of Life Is Strange 2 join Greg and Imran for a super fun spoilercast of the game.

attributes.title: RESULTS! Official Game Awards 2019 Predictions - Ep. 252
attributes.description: The boys find out who won the Game Awards predictions for 2019 in the last Gamescast of the year!
